website_summaries.verdict: With options for both slender and thicker rails, this cover has a unique threading design that helps prevent baby from making it loose.
pros: Microfiber polyester rail cover with special threading and knotting  technique that makes it hard for baby to tug and untie
Options for both narrow and thicker crib rails
Work even with curved crib rails
cons: Some babies are able to get these rail covers off, despite the more advanced tying system

customer_reviews.title: Great low price & functional!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the cheapest one I could find. It fits perfectly on my sons crib. There are no buttons for him to rip off and no velcro for him to rip apart which I appreciate. This does the job and looks nice as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you can...
customer_reviews.text: Distinct chemical smell. A couple of washes later seemed to improve it. It’s not as natural as I would like (given kids suck on it). I got the small size but recommend (if you have to buy this) get the larger size as the small one just looks tight, doesn’t fit well enough to hide the string ties. Which then get pulled - so you have to knot it, which makes taking it off to wash it tricky. Avoid if you can find a more natural solution...
customer_reviews.author: Mom&Son

customer_reviews.title: Good enough!
customer_reviews.text: Knocked 1 star off because I wish it was all cotton since my baby chews on it like crazy. Also wish there were 4 long protector wraps instead of 3 since I have a modern crib with 4 flat long sides- I had to order an entire other set for 1 more long piece. Otherwise, the gray color is fine for my baby's nursery, it was easy to assemble and stays fairly in place. Fabric is ok after the first wash but I put it in a laundry bag since it feels a little cheap. Overall, good enough for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: It's a cute lil crib again!
customer_reviews.text: With my first baby I never would've imagined these existed, because I had no need for them. Fast forward to baby #2 who is apparently half beaver. My cherry stained crib now looks like a crib you'd see Rosemary's Baby in: bite marks and teeth scratches all over the rails. My little dude was waking up with little flakes all over his face, lookin like he gnawed on a bloody steak. So I went in search of something to cover these now horrific rails. God bless Amazon. I bought covers for the front and side rails because, duh. The crib now looks like a baby crib again, not a demon crate. Hallelujah!
customer_reviews.author: kal3yk22

customer_reviews.title: Protects the railing but not baby
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because it looked a little thicker then the other products I researched. I was hoping to find something that would not only protect the railing on my son’s crib from being chewed but also from my son hitting his mouth on the railing. It definitely protects the railing from getting those bite marks but it does not provide any cushion so my son still hits his mouth on the railing and cries. He will just have to learn to not do that I guess! It was easy to install and did not fall apart after the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jk_817

customer_reviews.title: Cute and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we started noticing my one year old chewing on the railing of her crib. It’s really easy to wash and install. I washed in the washing machine right out of the package before attaching it to the crib. It fit perfectly across her crib and was easy to tie on. It’s thick enough to keep my daughter from doing any damage to her railing but not too thick that it would be bulky. Thus far my daughter hasn’t been able to get it off the railing and she’s pretty good with that kind of thing. It’s also quite soft. Not micro fleece soft but not just plain cottony texture. Overall I’m satisfied and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well. Slips off the crib very easily causing the baby to lose his balance, slip and fall when teething on it. I’ve called and emailed the company to let them know about this dangerous issue. They have done nothing to resolve it: Avoid this product!
customer_reviews.author: Roses

customer_reviews.title: Longer strings
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my daughter crib because she was chewing the edge. It does slide from side to side but it does stay on. I wish the two strings on the end were just a little longer as my crib has some thicker parts then it's hard to get the stri g tied nicely in that spot and I think that may be why is moves a little bit. Overall this is a nice product very soft and easy install.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This looks so good on our baby’s crib, we recently had painted the crib, although we used safe paint we didn’t want our baby chewing on that so we purchased these, my only complaint is the ties are a little short if you have a thicker crib rail so I don’t get “those cute little bows” you see in the pictures, but honestly isn’t that big of a deal because it serves it’s purpose, it’s also very cushioned and so soft to touch and the color is just right!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Not as soft as expected. You would need two or your crib will look plain. Not worth the price to me. My son like to bite on the rail but maybe I was better off just putting a blanket over? Also it looks as if its started to flip and does move side to side when my son grabs on to rail.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: These are working great, with a teething 10 month old I quickly realized I needed something for her crib. As I was putting these on she tried chewing on the rail and chewed on the cover instead of the rail it was perfect and worked immediately and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for baby who wants to chew on the crib rail!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my child who can now stand in the crib and likes to occasionally chew on the crib rail. He chomps on this too, but I can wash it as often as I desire, so my mind is clear, and there is no paint or wood in his mouth!
customer_reviews.author: V. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not for teething, but so my son would stop hitting his chin so hard on the crib rail when throwing a fit. I was expecting it to be a little thicker for that reason. But still serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is no longer eating paint!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter kept chewing on her crib rail & I tried to make her one of these. So glad I found this! Nice material, soft & thick. Easily tied on her crib & she has a wavy rail, not a straight one like in the pictures. Just throw it in the wash with her clothes & put it right back on.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Ermirio

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth buying! An absolute life saver if you’ve got a teething baby and a wood crib!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this!! Bought this and the side pads for my sons crib! 100% life saver! He was teething and started chewing away at the wood on his crib! These have saved his crib from any further damage and also added protection from him bonking his head! Super easy to clean and they look so cute on his crib!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L

customer_reviews.title: Soft and does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and does the job..it’s soft. And as you can see I’m able to still use his crib toy over the rails. I’ve had these rail guards for about a week now. Only thing was I had to double knot the bows because my 11 month old immediately started untying the bows!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Murray

customer_reviews.title: Easy! And love the color!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy was starting to go after the railings on his crib. Major teething time at our home. So I went on here trying to find something to cover the railings that was a mellow color and easy. ( nursing mama at home ) and this was GREAT! So easy! But I do have to say my little one can untie them if he wants. He is 14 months. But it’s no big deal to tie them right back on. Over all I love it. Great addition to his crib. And I don’t have to worry about him eating his crib :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Egetoe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in today! Loved the price! Loved the brand. Couldn’t wait to put it up, I absolutely love the color, it’s so neutral not a hard dark grey, or too blue it’s fresh, almost a sky grey blue tone too, hard to find. LOVE IT. I was worried about the straps being too short but it ended up working out. If I could suggest for the few cribs that come like mine, lengthening the outter straps, the two ends were too short and I couldn't put the cute bow. Other than that...9 or of 10!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Santos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 9 month old chewer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this railing pad! My baby was destroying the top of the railing and had tiny flecks of paint all over her face all the time after being in her crib. She still bites the railing but I feel this is much safer.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: True to color super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The product is true to color. I love the feel it’s so soft and I also love that it’s reversible. Super easy to install and made the crib instantly look so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Yanez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: These rail covers are perfect! My grandson chews on these & it is nice not worrying that he will hurt himself. I wish I had known about these with my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Priss

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap. Grey color is very pale
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap look. The "CribWrap" brand one I had before is the real deal. This one is cheap and tacky but will work if that's what your budget will allow.
customer_reviews.author: Taiepg

customer_reviews.title: Recommended product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product if your little one is starting to chew on their crib! Super easy to wash and install. The only negative is it is very easy for your little one to untie even when installed correctly. Just make sure to check it often and re-tie as needed. Double knotting will probably do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: My son no longer bites the crib railing
customer_reviews.text: My son started putting his mouth on the crib rail so I decided to look for a guard. I have used the sticky ones (which ruins the crib rail) I came across this product and love it! Very easy to put on and clean. My son no longer puts his mouth on the railing. What a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Irene G

customer_reviews.title: Look for something with waterproof backing
customer_reviews.text: These are flimsy and don't provide very much padding. The inside padding has gotten crumpled and they stain even after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cause i'm reusing an old crib that had plastic on the rails but it was old and gross looking so these were perfect for covering it up and protecting those rails. super easy to put on
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great crib rail protector.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, even on curved rails. Well sewn, soft, easy to remove for cleaning. I love the soft grey color.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D

customer_reviews.title: It does what it should! Protect those baby teeth.
customer_reviews.text: My baby started chewing on the crib and I was in shock to find out this is a thing. Soon as I did the research I went out and bought this to keep him from gnawing on wood.... And it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Super simple crib rail cover, looks great! I padded it with a strip of old towel beneath the cover to make it a tad thicker. So far so good. Nice anig fit, clean lines.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Great over foam. Not by itself.
customer_reviews.text: Great to place over the foam protective rail covers so that baby does not eat the damn thing. Not good on its own, since baby can hit himself without anything foam to protect him.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protecting little teeth and the rail
customer_reviews.text: I've used the plastic covers for crib rails that you just pop on in the past and was never too thrilled with them. My kids were always able to get them off and they were ugly. This is great because it's soft, protects both baby and furniture, is easy to wash and install. There's no bad thing about it for me. Also, is aesthetically nice. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Shin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. These crib rails are perfect for my teething baby. They easily tie onto the rail of the crib. You also cannot beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: 30 Year Old Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Teething life saver
customer_reviews.text: My 13 month old is teething and started chewing the front of his crib. I purchased this product and it works perfectly. It fits well and easy to install and remove for washing. So glad this product was available!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M.

customer_reviews.title: Design is bad
customer_reviews.text: Did not like how it attached to the crib. It was confusing and the toes were not long enough. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Added pieces
customer_reviews.text: I may have missed this when ordering, but when I received it and applied it, I wish there were shorter ones for the side rails.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and looks great on the crib. I feel better knowing my grandson won’t be biting the crib and if he bumps his face, it’s has a little padding.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This cover looks great! It is easy to put on and take off for easy cleaning, but stays on well. My toddler hasn't pulled it off yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old started teething on the metal bed rails. Thank goodness I found these! I love them! They're cute and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really suggest you gets for babies who Stanf now the beds so they don’t hit them selves I which it was a lil more cushiony but it works well
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. Great for teething baby. Easy to install and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jocohow

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Also bought the side rails to complete the set. My son isn’t chewing on his wooden crib anymore which is a win for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on any crib, great for gender neutral room/crib, matches with other crib rail covers.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t match crib skirt
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks but thought it would match better with the pale grey tillyou crib skirt. This seams lighter and not quite the same color. It’s bugging me!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly and does the job, prevents baby from chewing on crib. Never washed it yet, so I don't know if it washes well or not. One thing keep in mind; it closes with strings, not the best thing to have around baby's. I worked out my bow that it shouldn't be easy for baby to pull.
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Practical, affordable option!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and keeps little man from chewing the paint off the rails. Haven’t washed it yet, but it looks well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Creecher

customer_reviews.title: very thin material
customer_reviews.text: For some reason i thought this would be a thicker material. but its really not. if you need something because your baby is biting down on the rail get something else. this is way too thin. might as well be chewing the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Great product, a little expensive for what it is. Thin padding, cloth fabric. Super easy to toss in with the laundry to wash. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Zarnowski

customer_reviews.title: Must have for baby biters
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver. My one year old is a biter and this has saved our crib and my one year old from ingesting paint.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Stopped the biting
customer_reviews.text: This product does it's job, which is really all I care about. The gray color is very nice and goes with my nursery.
customer_reviews.author: S Satkowski

customer_reviews.title: Bite guard!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my son was biting his crib and it works great! Easy to put on and it’s super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Soft, easy to wash, easy to put on!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! Prevents my baby from chewing the crib rails, but also adds some softness... when my daughter first started trying to stand in the crib, she would bump her face on the rail. This adds a little barrier!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great 👍 it is very very soft and well padded.
customer_reviews.author: Robert V.

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit
customer_reviews.text: The cribs that we have have a decorative molding on the rail which made these rail covers not fit at all. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisandNicole

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have ordered this before my son chewed the crib but he won’t mar it any more!
customer_reviews.author: Molly B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product does its job!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep my granddaughter from biting the side of the crib. Works perfectly and doesn't look tacky at all.
customer_reviews.author: Texas LensLady

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my sons nursery
customer_reviews.text: my son just started pulling himself up & standing in his crib, no sooner did he start biting the railings. ordered these to protect his crib, they came fast and fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Coss

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: May have put them on wrong? But they don't stay in place and the ties are a little short... But it's a nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this crib rail, it’s fits perfect very soft. I would totally recommend it it’s worth the purchase and the price
customer_reviews.author: Maribel Serna

customer_reviews.title: Crib saver!
customer_reviews.text: My baby was chewing up her crib rails until I bought these. They work great and it saved the crib from being chewed to pieces while she was teething. Easy to install, and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Paquette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the chewer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my little guy who wants to eat the rail. Washes well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Wisefield

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Its lovely but my 9 month old manages to take it apart no matter how tight we tie it
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice crib rail pad
customer_reviews.text: This crib rail fits perfectly on the crib. The color is exactly as described. I am very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: My son was chewing up his crib. This product was affordable and easy to place on his crib.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Quevedo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are the right size and are easy to get on and off for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing strings to attach
customer_reviews.text: Missing strings to be able to attach it which was disappointing since everything else was good about it.
customer_reviews.author: william a hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: There are 4 sides to a crib! But you only get one rail cover! Very misleading
customer_reviews.author: Amy Curtiss

customer_reviews.title: works gret
customer_reviews.text: easy to wash. baby has only been able to untie one section one time and I have had it for a month. I love it. no more eating the crib!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Took me a little while to realize how to tie it. My fault, not the manufacturer. 🤦🏻‍♀️ Otherwise I love it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice rail guards
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, exactly as described. Looks nice on the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install and remove for washing. This was a necessity as my 1 yr old kept chewing the bed up.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The quality was amazing, which shocked me because of how low the price was. It is very soft, plush, and looks fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like this product. It was easy to install and my baby loves to chew on it. My only negative observation is because it is only secured by tying the front bows, my baby was able to bite and rip so hard it came apart. It wasn't a big deal at all, but he did have easier access to the ribbons, which made me nervous. Still, overall, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great Fix for Teething Infant
customer_reviews.text: Great, easy to use product. Shipped quickly - needed a fast fix because my 8 month old started pulling up to stand and chewing the top of the crib within a day! Thanks Tillyou!
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I was expecting but this far surpassed my expectations. It’s so nice and can be washed! So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Greenlee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. Looks super nice. I love the pull through strings to create the bow on the outside. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: leanne smith

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: It is a solid gray color which I was looking for, but we don’t like this one at all. The installation with ties is a real pain. It never stays tight and my daughter easily moves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay P

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Soft and stay on crib rails. My girls would chew on the crib rails so we got these and they serve their purpose
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it looks good and keeps my son from chewing on his crib railing. Easy to putnon and take off to clean. I wish there was an option to buy just one of sides though. Our crib is attached to a changing table so we need just one side cover to go with the front cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Camasso

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: My son was starting to chew on his wooden crib and these bumpers keep him from doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Annie W

customer_reviews.title: Measure the rail diameter first
customer_reviews.text: This is not made for cribs that have thick railing. We will have to by a different one. The quality and packaging were nice though!

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This does wonders for the crib and protects it from my baby’s teeth marks.

customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product and just what we were looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Just what I needed. Padded great for when baby chews or bonks on it.

customer_reviews.text: So easy to place on the baby's crib.. Fast shipping 👍 exactly what we need only thing is that it's less than an inch short but it's not a big deal.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Perfect fit. There are two different sets on the picture but it matches in color and size. Make sure you choose the right size for your grib, otherwise it won’t be tight.
customer_reviews.author: Anzhela

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to protect our new crib from our little one’s biting! It’s protectant and doesn’t slide when he pulls himself up. Love that it’s reversible too!

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t purchase again
customer_reviews.text: It comes loose a lot. Soft but it’s annoying that I have to re-tie it so often.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for saving my babe’s crib rails. He’s teething and wants to bite everything. This is soft and safe for his teeth and the crib rails aren’t getting eaten anymore

customer_reviews.text: Everything! Exactly what I needed and exactly the right fit! Great material well made too! This product will last a long time!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a lot with bumpers but i know will come in handy when she is standing and biting at the side of crib

customer_reviews.title: Amazing?
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! I literally watch my baby knaw on it and I have no worries at all about the crib! Wish we found this product sooner!

customer_reviews.title: Protects the crib from teething baby!
customer_reviews.text: My teething son loves to bite on his wooden crib. We purchased these to cover the railing and prevent the biting as much as possible! These are definitely helpful and easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and effective
customer_reviews.text: These are super soft and fit the crib perfectly. Very easy to put on. The color and fabric are as expected.

customer_reviews.text: I like this cover, but will say I have to knot them before tying as my little one can untie them easily! However, they are easy to clean, soft, and look cute! Saving our rails!

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I was looking for! It was really easy to put on the crib and has stayed in place really well!

product_meta.title: TILLYOU 1-Pack Padded Baby Crib Rail Cover Protector Safe Teething Guard Wrap for Long Front Crib Rails(Measuring Up to 8" Around), 100% Silky Soft Microfiber Polyester, Reversible, White/Pale Gray
feature_bullets: Simple Way to Get It Secured - Put One String Through the Hole and Another One Aside. Double Knot Them Together to Make Sure the Covers Are Not Easy to Fall Out
SAFETY IS EVERYTHING. Free of PVC, Lead, Phthalate or BPA. Certified by CPSIA, our rail covers are totally safe and gentle for young baby(s) - 100% Silky Soft Microfiber Fabric
NARROW SIZE - Measuring 51” x7”, our covers fit thick front rails up to 8 inch around. Measure 4 inch width when folded. Extra wider than other competitors’. A MUST-HAVE for your expensive crib(s)
Padded with 200 GSM thick microfiber filling, our rail cover will protect your crib from teething marks and scratches and protect baby from chewing crib rails while teething. CHEW-ABLE and PROTECTIVE

MACHINE WASHABLE & EASY CARE. Do not shrink or fade. Anti-pill and satin resistant. Wipe clean with damp cloth when it’s not too dirty. Decent baby shower/registry gift for families or friends. PACKAGE - Reusable Little Pouch

Rich Color Options. Available in GRAY, NAVY, WHITE, PINK or BLUE, TILLYOU rail covers are designed to fit all kinds of crib bedding set, whether it’s for a boy or girl. An extra soft, fitted layer to cover your crib(s)
